author: Ildefonso Ortiz
title: Mexican Government Denounces Health Worker Harassment as Coronavirus Cases Hit 2439
description: Mexican health officials denounced cases of harassment targeting nurses and doctors amid the novel Coronavirus (COVID-19). The announcement comes as nearly 300 new cases push the total to 2,439 since the start of the pandemic.
content:
Mexican health officials denounced cases of harassment targeting nurses and doctors amid the novel Coronavirus (COVID-19). The announcement comes as nearly 300 new cases push the total to 2,439 since the start of the pandemic.
